title: [GAMEPLAY] Kayn has no inking around his model.
body:
Whether or not you toggle Character Inking on/off in Settings>Video>Character Inking in client, a dark outline does not appear on Kayn. I think this makes him look kind of wonky in comparison to every other champion who has it, when you have it toggled on. 

**WITH INKING TURNED ON FOR KAYN:**
http://i.imgur.com/0FX0rfX.png

**WITH INKING TURNED OFF FOR KAYN:**
http://i.imgur.com/hBfGIye.png

For a comparison, here's Aatrox with Character Inking turned on and off. If you are having a hard time seeing it, note the dark outline around his blade in one picture, and the absence of it in another:

**WITH CHARACTER INKING TURNED ON FOR AATROX:**
http://i.imgur.com/TEchMDN.png

**WITH CHARACTER INKING TURNED OFF FOR AATROX:**
http://i.imgur.com/bXSrL4O.png

Note the differences between the two. I hope this gets resolved soon!

replies.body:
Hey! 

*For context, I'm on Skins, but I poked Champion about this.*

This is working as intended; they intentionally disabled character inking for Kayn.
Despite its intent I think we should have the option to see him inked, it hurts my eyes is harder to see. Plus the feature is already integrated for every champion.

Please enable it again... character models look really ugly without the inking, it just doesn't work with the rest of the map visuals IMO. I think Xayah also has no inking.

Also now that we have the completely over the top Kayn Q particles can we finally get Yasuo EQ particles back? The clarity reasons don't make sense anymore.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xXMdqr2g,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-12T18:49:43.658+0000)
>
> Hey! 
> 
> *For context, I'm on Skins, but I poked Champion about this.*
> 
> This is working as intended; they intentionally disabled character inking for Kayn.

That...seems really odd, actually, since that means that Kayn alone stands out with inking on. Would love to know why if you can share it, as I personally really prefer the inking-on effect, and it being missing from just one guy is going to be a bit weird. :P

Well, that's a wrap folks. 

Do you know why it was disabled for him? Is it disabled on any other champions due to a similar issue or reason?
its cuz of his hair, it would not fit, and they are also testing pleayers reaction globaly, to see if they remove or not character inking.
PLEASE BRING BACK INKING... ITS REALLY BECOMING AN ISSUE LOOKING AT THE NEWER CHARACTER BUILDS
